name: The Ever After
description:
The Ever After is a retro inspired couch co-op, platformer. A fun and gun adventure set in a hand illustrated fairytale world.

Grow beanstalks and flap, float and fly your way up into the clouds, looting castles and destroying monsters. Use a weird and wonderful variety of weapons and upgrades you find along the way. We know all about Jack and his Beanstalk... This is the story of his two children Dill and Poppy.

This is a prototype of the game. It is best played with an XBox controller. To play with 2 players, 2 controllers are required. If you don't have a controller, you can still play single-player with the keyboard controls: Z to jump, X shoot, D to parry, and Spacebar to buy.

#arcade #multiplayer #shooter #adventure #platformer
